org.openstreetmap.josm.gradle.plugin.config

Class JosmPluginExtension

  • org.openstreetmap.josm.gradle.plugin.config.JosmPluginExtension

  • public class JosmPluginExtension

    This extension is added to the project as project.josm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JosmPluginExtension(org.gradle.api.Project project)
      instantiates the extension, takes project properties into account

    • Method Summary

      Returns the class JosmPluginExtension for a particular Project.
      java.lang.Integer getDebugPort()
      This is required, when you want to run the task debugJosm. Set this to the port on which you want to listen for the debug output.

      Configuration options for i18n

      The version number of JOSM against which the plugin should be compiled.

      The directory where the default preferences.xml file is located, which will be used when the directory defined in tmpJosmHome is empty.
      JosmManifest getManifest()
      The manifest for the JOSM plugin
      int getMaxPluginDependencyDepth()
      When determining on which JOSM plugins this project depends, dependency chains are followed this number of steps. This number is the termination criterion when recursively searching for JOSM plugins that are required through JosmManifest.pluginDependencies.
      kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable,org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable> getPackIntoJarFileFilter()
      When packing the dependencies of the packIntoJar configuration into the distribution *.jar, this closure is applied to the file tree. If you want to exclude certain files in your dependencies into your release, you can modify this. By default the /META-INF/ directory of dependencies is discarded.

      • JosmPluginExtension

        public JosmPluginExtension(org.gradle.api.Project project)

        instantiates the extension, takes project properties into account

    • Method Detail

      • getJosmCompileVersion

        public java.lang.String getJosmCompileVersion()

        The version number of JOSM against which the plugin should be compiled.

        Default value: The value of the property plugin.compile.version or null if that property is not set.

      • setJosmCompileVersion

        public void setJosmCompileVersion(java.lang.String p)

        The version number of JOSM against which the plugin should be compiled.

        Default value: The value of the property plugin.compile.version or null if that property is not set.

      • getDebugPort

        public java.lang.Integer getDebugPort()

        This is required, when you want to run the task debugJosm. Set this to the port on which you want to listen for the debug output.

      • setDebugPort

        public void setDebugPort(java.lang.Integer p)

        This is required, when you want to run the task debugJosm. Set this to the port on which you want to listen for the debug output.

      • getTmpJosmHome

        public java.io.File getTmpJosmHome()

        The directory which should be used as JOSM home directory when executing the runJosm or debugJosm tasks.

        Default value: $buildDir/.josm

      • setTmpJosmHome

        public void setTmpJosmHome(java.io.File p)

        The directory which should be used as JOSM home directory when executing the runJosm or debugJosm tasks.

        Default value: $buildDir/.josm

      • getJosmConfigDir

        public java.io.File getJosmConfigDir()

        The directory where the default preferences.xml file is located, which will be used when the directory defined in tmpJosmHome is empty.

        Default value: $projectDir/config/josm

      • setJosmConfigDir

        public void setJosmConfigDir(java.io.File p)

        The directory where the default preferences.xml file is located, which will be used when the directory defined in tmpJosmHome is empty.

        Default value: $projectDir/config/josm

      • getMaxPluginDependencyDepth

        public int getMaxPluginDependencyDepth()

        When determining on which JOSM plugins this project depends, dependency chains are followed this number of steps. This number is the termination criterion when recursively searching for JOSM plugins that are required through JosmManifest.pluginDependencies.

      • setMaxPluginDependencyDepth

        public void setMaxPluginDependencyDepth(int value)

        When determining on which JOSM plugins this project depends, dependency chains are followed this number of steps. This number is the termination criterion when recursively searching for JOSM plugins that are required through JosmManifest.pluginDependencies.

      • getPackIntoJarFileFilter

        public kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable,org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable> getPackIntoJarFileFilter()

        When packing the dependencies of the packIntoJar configuration into the distribution *.jar, this closure is applied to the file tree. If you want to exclude certain files in your dependencies into your release, you can modify this. By default the /META-INF/ directory of dependencies is discarded.

        Default value: { it.exclude("META-INF/**/*") }

        See Also:
        org.gradle.api.file.FileTree.matching, PatternFilterable

      • setPackIntoJarFileFilter

        public void setPackIntoJarFileFilter(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable,? extends org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable> p)

        When packing the dependencies of the packIntoJar configuration into the distribution *.jar, this closure is applied to the file tree. If you want to exclude certain files in your dependencies into your release, you can modify this. By default the /META-INF/ directory of dependencies is discarded.

        Default value: { it.exclude("META-INF/**/*") }

        See Also:
        org.gradle.api.file.FileTree.matching, PatternFilterable

      • packIntoJarFileFilter

        public void packIntoJarFileFilter(groovy.lang.Closure<org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable> closure)

        Set the packIntoJarFileFilter with a Groovy Closure

        See Also:
        Closure

      • getRepositories

        public kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.RepositoryHandler,kotlin.Unit> getRepositories()

        The repositories that are added to the repository list.

        Default value (in this order):

        1. Nexus repo for JOSM releases: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/releases/ (as Maven repo)

        2. Download page for JOSM releases and snapshots: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/download/ (as custom Ivy repo, the Archiv subdirectory is also included)

        3. Directory in SVN repo where JOSM plugins are published: https://svn.openstreetmap.org/applications/editors/josm/dist/ (as custom Ivy repo)

        4. Nexus repo for JOSM snapshots: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/ (as Maven repo)

        See Also:
        https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/releases/, https://josm.openstreetmap.de/download/, https://svn.openstreetmap.org/applications/editors/josm/dist/, https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/, RepositoryHandler

      • setRepositories

        public void setRepositories(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.RepositoryHandler,kotlin.Unit> p)

        The repositories that are added to the repository list.

        Default value (in this order):

        1. Nexus repo for JOSM releases: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/releases/ (as Maven repo)

        2. Download page for JOSM releases and snapshots: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/download/ (as custom Ivy repo, the Archiv subdirectory is also included)

        3. Directory in SVN repo where JOSM plugins are published: https://svn.openstreetmap.org/applications/editors/josm/dist/ (as custom Ivy repo)

        4. Nexus repo for JOSM snapshots: https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/ (as Maven repo)

        See Also:
        https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/releases/, https://josm.openstreetmap.de/download/, https://svn.openstreetmap.org/applications/editors/josm/dist/, https://josm.openstreetmap.de/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/, RepositoryHandler
